highlights: 仿真花朵设计:这种猫树有两个花和一个高架架,在其底座周围有天然剑麻麻,19 x 14 英寸(约 48.3 x 35.6 厘米)椭圆形,看起来像一朵仿真花。 外观可爱清新,可融入任何现代装饰中,为任何房间增添乐趣
娱乐、休息、锻炼:小猫可以享受上下跳跃的乐趣。 花朵上的人造羊羔羊毛使您的宠物躺在上面很舒服。 悬挂的毛绒球可以吸引猫咪的注意并开始狩猎游戏
【安全支架】扩大椭圆形底座,提供可靠的稳定性,防止任何晃动或翻倒的机会。 更加安全稳定,提供可靠性和稳定性
家具保护器:我们的猫树可以像猫活动中心一样吸引猫咪注意力,防止您的其他家具被划伤
组装简单:柱子和底座的简单结构需要少量组装。 分步说明让猫树更加简单。 您可以在几分钟内完成组装。

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFHE7H5GA3IUPYWRWF4D52WZHKNQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2021
reviews.review_title: Smaller than the photos make it seem
reviews.review: \n  This cat tree is SO adorable and very soft in person - the only problem is that my cat is WAY too big for it. It\'s much shorter and smaller than the photos make it seem. Ideal for a kitten/young adult cat, but my two year old ragdoll is way too big for it and I will be (sadly) returning it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG7J26WFZ5WSTWNPIFOG3SPOC4VA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2021
reviews.review: \n  The bottom piece is actually two separate pieces that is only held together by the carpet. There was a washer that seemed to be an extra part as it wasn’t shown on the instructions but I realized it was meant to support the bottom two pieces to keep from folding. Unfortunately, the bottom piece  is not strong enough to hold back the two pieces with just the washer and it pulled the material in half. I was able to reinforce the bottom with some boards I had but for the price, I expect much better quality. The second picture depicts how the tower ends up when my cat jumps off.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHWLD5HNOA3O5ZOS6ENYBFI2S5PQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2021
reviews.review:
\n UPDATE: The company reached out to me, concerned that the product I received had broken so easily and was unsafe for my cats. They promptly sent a replacement that had some helpful design changes. The replacement cat tree is far more stable and no longer wobbles all over the place when my cats jump up on it. So far the little flower perches have held up this time and my cats are throughly pleased to have their bedroom cat napping spot restored.

I wanted to love this cat tree. My cats wanted to love this cat tree. You see, they were several months overdue for new Kitty trees and toys so I ordered them a flurry of goodies here on Amazon, including this cat tree.

We had high hopes. However due to the way this cat tree is constructed (the bottom piece folds in half, held together only by the carpet and a bolt inconveniently placed at the center of the two pieces) it wobbles and sways more than a drunk person at a frat party.

Furthermore, the smaller yellow flower ledge also snapped in half when one of my cats jumped up on it. His name is Fred, he is very conscious about his figure so imagine his dismay when he jumped up and the ledge holding him snapped in half. Needless to say it didn’t do much for his self esteem.

If I had time I would return this product. But alas, it’s the holiday season and I think I may be several days past the return window now. That said, be aware that this product is clearly not worth the asking price, I’ve seen better engineering from five year olds with legos.

Now, thanks to the failure of this cat tree to deliver a fun, sturdy perching/playing/napping option for my mini lions, my wife and our army of cats have convinced me that I must instead build new cat trees from scratch.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHLIJNAQQ777JWS2SH3G5E7OJOUA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2020
reviews.review: \n  Amazing and so cute! A little short, but fits perfectly in a corner or right next to the bed. My cats love it! My chunkier cat in the photo barely fits, but still loves to lay and sleep in it! I highly recommend!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHCKHMYNX6NCQHT2IPGATJMRHPXA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
reviews.review: \n  It is so cute but honestly the quality is trash. Our cats ( 3 ) tour this thing up faster then they do plastic bags. I mean, we have had a cat tree for 6 months and literally no damage even though they use it all the time, but this right here. Man, the bottom is made of cardboard, literally not figuratively.  I will probably transfer the posts to a piece of wood but that’s not what I paid for the item to do. I wouldn’t by unless you have a slow lazy cat that just sits, ours are young and do the most so that probably why it broke. We did have to add a planner ring to the bottom to make it work but it basically trashed.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFGVO4357ZEWBMZPYANS7JCQTCLA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
reviews.review: \n  Let\'s start with the positives. It looks like it will be sturdy enough once we can get it assembled. The colors are vibrant. And the platforms definitely look like they will be comfortable for the cats. It comes with everything you need except detailed instructions? It has been extremely difficult just to screw the parts together. A piece was included in the Box that was not depicted on the instructions (an extra pedestal or possibly an extension to one of the pedestals?) And its use was not explained in the instructions. And not to sound Petty but it also smells weird like vinegar. Luckily my dad is good with tools so we\'ll see if we can try and get it together anyway.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHRFDDXCFB5WWFG3OLBS2LY3C3DA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.review: \n  It is adorable but in no way stable. The base is in two pieces, held together by a piece of carpet. I ended up having to use gorilla glue to hold them together because it would rock and almost fall over when my cats jumped on it. Even after gluing the base together, the top platform is still very unstable. It leans to whichever side the cat is sitting, which means my cats rarely get on it.  You can see the lean in the attached picture (cat lured to perch with catnip).\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGRC3FZDLLENINROPGVP72AH2B6Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.review:
\n This is the cutest cat tower I\'ve ever seen! It\'s so much more colorful than most other cat towers, and has such a pretty, unique design. I\'d buy it even if I didn\'t have cats — it\'s that cute.

It was easy to assemble. It\'s on the shorter side when it comes to towers, but it\'s perfect for kittens. I can see my kitties outgrowing the perches as they grow bigger, but since it\'s not too tall, I hope they\'ll continue to use it when they\'re older and can\'t climb as high as they used to.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFVMXJZOKYW25U7L2VQUXI7DAP7A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2022
reviews.review: \n  My all cats love this tree. Will buy more !\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHD2QJJUYDUVKPR2REQM5UPJBFLQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
reviews.review: \n   I was looking for something cute to go in my daughter‘s room for the kitten. It is held together by a split piece of cardboard the cat is afraid to go on it because it is so unstable as shown by the video. We missed our return window so we’re stuck with this flimsy thing.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHDKC2WKMNAV6OW62J5CQUAJUHUA
reviews.review: \n  Great little cat tree, super stinkin cute. Cat wouldn\'t stay on it for the photo, even with cat nip!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEJHUPJ5VQB37HH4Q5QOZJHI5TFQ
reviews.review_title: I would give it 10 stars, if I could!
reviews.review: \n  Most cat trees are too tall, or too wide, and definitely too ugly. :-) This one was not only super-cute, but also, we could mix and match the pieces to make it exactly fit. AAA+++\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHDTONDG6QWHABT3VPPAXOR4KZEA
reviews.review: \n  Love this cat tree,tried buying it from Wish twice and they said it wasn\'t available after days of ordering it.This seller shipped super fast 🙂very good quality cat tree.Thank you!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFBK3E4IHMHRWL2ZKEJJCKB5Z6EA
reviews.review_title: So Cute and my cat loved it until it broke with him in it
reviews.review: \n  My 10 lb cat enjoyed this cat tree for a couple of weeks. He played with the ball. He scratched the post. And I love the look of it. But, alas, he just went to get in it and bam. Over it fell with the bottom cracked. I\'m returning it and this time going for sturdy over cute.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHZG5AZMPP5ZVL7YSICDJPKFP4YA
reviews.review: \n  This was a great purchase for my kitty! I love that it is cuter than the typical cat tree and goes with my decor much better. It was really easy to assemble and is very soft. Good quality and well worth the price. Quick shipping. Thank you!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGRWXXIWLHAOASOHNYVV2J3SYNXA
reviews.review: \n  It\'s been less than a year since I purchased and it is falling apart. Not steady, both of the flowers broke in half. I try super gluing but that didn\'t work! Disappointed. I\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEOPO5AVUJRFDOBCESALF74B36TQ
reviews.review:
\n I have 2 cats who both love this. It’s small yet sturdy. Very easy to assemble. And it’s cute!
I would order again.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGMJW2YXB6GZOUVV5UYDWSXRMPVQ
reviews.review: \n  I like this little cat tree a lot, however the base comes folded in half and relies on a washer and screw to keep it straight and stable. After a few weeks I noticed it folding up despite the washer. I think I\'m going to have to attach the base to a board to continue using it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHPLVBBF6FXL3FESA77KIEKSWHYQ
reviews.review: \n  but it smells so horrendous very strongly of what I\'m guessing wood? I did not like that I\'m literally writing this review in the middle of the night because the smell is stuck in my nose. I\'m sniffing a candle as I write this by the way. other than that my cat seems to like it and is already using it. It\'s also very cheaply made it doesn\'t look that way but once you put it together you can tell. if i could go back to the moment before I buy this i wouldn\'t buy it. thanks for coming to my ted talk\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEX5FCMZZRPATGDCJ6XMUJWSQUIA
reviews.review: \n  This cat climbing frame has a reasonable design, complete structure and functions, the spacing between levels is right, and it also has the function of grinding claws. Cats like it very much. The installation is also very simple, with a small wrench attached to the shelf, it will be installed in ten minutes. The cat has a new home and jumps up and down, so happy!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGMOYHESPWNHHGJMMIXS2BJIOCAA
reviews.review_title: very unstable and made of wafer board . Very expensive piece of junk. I don’t recommend this to buy.
reviews.review: \n  Cheap base is two pieces and designed badly, does not fit together very sturdy and collapses when the the tree falls due to instability.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGUDLDQNEBBTAQAJPSLZC3IPKEFQ
reviews.review: \n  i’ve had this cat tree for a month and it’s already falling apart. the cardboard on bottom has separated from the carpet, so only the short purple flower can stand on it’s own. i’m going to replace the cardboard for wood, but repairs shouldnt be necessary for a $60 cat tree\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGOX2JT7E6ZLYIQD2SCMWFHOU2XA
reviews.review: \n  Super cute but very very flimsy. Doesn’t hold up.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHWAFXFFCSXX5EWNPDHJ2HOZF34A
reviews.review_title: Really small for a full grown cat.  Great for kittens.  Wouldn’t hold my big boy.
reviews.review: \n  Easy to assemble but much smaller than expected\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE7EL7A3MJZRGPLVYR2X5OEHESZA
reviews.review: \n  Very cute, but very small. My adult cat can fit on the orange seat but not the flowers. Definitely for small kittens.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEZ2P7QIPNSJPXTEZ7BWN2PLVUVQ
reviews.review: \n  The tower was easy to assemble and so incredibly adorable, but the quality is nothing close to what i was expecting. The bottom piece broke almost immediately. Read the reviews AFTER purchasing and saw that this was happening to many people. Would not buy again !!!!!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHML6RB6EJYC42XEY4ALA76C3JGA
reviews.review: \n  My cat tree didn’t assemble. The tall tower either had a stripped screw, a missing piece, or the screw was too short. I contacted the company over 2 1/2 weeks ago with no response.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFLR7Y63PNZ7MHBVEL6Z2D4ETVYA
reviews.review: \n  Loved this cat tree when I I first viewed it. It was colorful and different. However, when I received it, it was a total disappointment.  The cat tree smelled terrible, it is very poor quality. This item should not be for sale at all. I usually do not write reviews, but felt I had to with this item.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFIQMCA2RJ4ZCKO43UWDTNEDUSRQ
reviews.review: \n  Great looking & really easy assembly!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEI7BAGL72F7XA4B2VXCWGU7TMKQ
reviews.review_title: My cat likes it but it’s small
reviews.review: \n  It’s very cute and relatively sturdy but my cat barely fits the bed. My cat is 1 year old and 10 lbs. She still likes to lay in it tho so I will keep it. She also loves the hanging ball.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEYZQQ6R2HZQDX4QN3IJHTXWERZA
reviews.review: \n  Cute little cat tree  My cat loves it\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHTTJJVLGDWUJ7EYJKPYDPQMP7DA
reviews.review: \n  The cardboard is cheap and snaps in half. It is flimsy and does not hold the cat\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AECWXOLWIPF3XU5KRADRG6H3OXAQ
reviews.review: \n  Easy to put together and looks great! Cat loves the ball.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHNP2YCP6J4CJP4S7EFPSRIPLYDQ
reviews.review: \n  this is a great cat tree! it’s so cute and I love it! I also posted it on tik tok and it’s absolutely blew up! I’m so sorry if this inconvenienced you!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH6QNQCYMKLDH7SX24HVMO3X4ALA
reviews.review: \n  That\'s all it took for these fur babies to have something new to scratch and play on. It was super easy to put together,came with everything I needed to put it together. As you can see it\'s already a fan favorite!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEJMOBQIXTXDY27XFH64Z7T2E6XA
reviews.review_title: Very cute, fairly small, kitty loves to scratch
reviews.review: \n  Came fast, great seller!!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHV4B4YUVSV7YFN73SLD7TADPHFQ
reviews.review_title: Pretty to look at and kitten approved.
reviews.review: \n  This was very easy to assemble and my cat loved it from the start. It’s colorful and goes with my eclectic taste.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF3GOAHVJH472K55ILM54V4KDT4A
reviews.review: \n  The bottom is not sturdy at all, my cat broke it in a few months. It completely snapped the bottom part in half, and now it won’t stand at all. Would not buy.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH3DJ3BC7ZRTR5VYQXATI3RZECKQ
reviews.review_title: I love and so does my Leep
reviews.review: \n  Love it so much it’s so cute and easy to assemble, although the directions are wrong and you’ll have to follow the picture to get what it should look like, the directions make it smaller and the picture makes it bigger!!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AETTDTI4LPK4UWA6TQPTHJDOA5NQ
reviews.review: \n  my kitten loves this & it’s so cute! she doesn’t sit on it but she loves playing with the hanging puff ball and using it as a scratching post!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHGCOWNF5V646FWX2ZHWK5Y4LSDA
reviews.review_title: Too small monthly for a kitten. Won’t last long
reviews.review: \n   This item is mostly for a kitten. Too small eventually for a 1 year old cat\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGFNPE6HWDAJA7FJ6VMSWAJXJBIA
reviews.review: \n  East to assemble, but not very stable.  Better suited for cats under 10 lbs.  I do like the colors.  Not the same boring beige, brown, or gray.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHHGJCD6AVKV2ZJMDL4BAGDK4QXQ
reviews.review: \n  This tree is too small for my average sized cats to fit in. It looks pretty good tho. It’d be good for kittens.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEGFN2EEZTUHCRODCUCGDFDPE5CQ
reviews.review: \n  Pretty easy to assemble, it is really sturdy and now my kitten can look out the window. Kitty approved!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEMEVASENO5UEKL7QLAH4QGO5C3A
reviews.review: \n  Looks exactly like the picture very easy to put together and very cute!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFT4MGAEQBA6IOME35NFR7HUG75A
reviews.review: \n  Very cute, but the based broke the first time the cat jumped off it. Not very stable either. Very wobbly.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH3NKSEUZHJMRXFTOQPBPSIX35RQ
reviews.review: \n  It’s broke after a week\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHF3E4T6DNSP7HNODZ44KP6RNEBQ
reviews.review: \n  This cat tree is cute but the spot where cats can lay is so small, a full grown cat will not fit on it\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF77QSE6UJ4Z6PI36BEENNT5NTMQ

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFYXQGLR4R6VNHWQP2YRHNY5CFAA
reviews.review: \n  My cat loves it. And so do I I’m happy that I found a cat tree that was cute, functional, and it didn’t break the bank. Building it took me about 5 minutes and it was pretty self explanatory on what to do as well.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH2JLL3REGZ55SA2K6ZTFWRDXFZQ

reviews.review: \n  I had it for 2 weeks before my 3 lbs kitten broke it by jumping on it too hard. It’s very flimsy. Will not be buying a new one.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEUIFLGYNCJVTUIYTWF5FYSUTIPQ

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHC5OGTUBH7METRX23T5YTOXAJ6A

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGBDGSF76PJ3BMYEFR5X7I4HWJ3A

reviews.review: \n  broke on the 3rd day\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH3Z5XH2H64JZSAOKO6V3J3IDE4Q

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFVO2GDKWLGO3O447KUMRXEJYL4A
reviews.review: \n  Kitties love it! Had to put a lil catnip on it to warm them up to it but they literally fight over it now.\n

reviews.review: \n  Super cute and pretty sturdy. Small tho, probably best for a kitten or small cat\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGEILSVQKZVN35T5G6YYB6STOAZQ
reviews.review: \n  very small and not as sturdy as one would hope.\n

reviews.review: \n  Not sturdy at all and is very small\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEGVHEOOWX4P3SUP3P6BCLQ2GZAQ
reviews.review: \n  Slumped 😴\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHEEHUFSSXFFAEN7GDSF6PWFZXQA
reviews.review_title: My cats won\'t get off this great tower!
reviews.review: \n  This cat tower is adorable! My cats were interested into it right away! Took me about 3 minutes to set up. Very easy to do. It\'s actually really stable aswell. The cats jumped on it and it stayed Still. The cats can now relax in peace on some beautiful flowers in the sky. Would definitely purchase again if I had more cats\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFQS2G7VXYQ77BR245HP3BWLKQNA
reviews.review:
\n I saw all the great reviews. I was so excited, but what I got compared to everyone else’s photos is not the same. Like they got name brand and I got knock-off/returned product. The max height on mine is 20-21 inches- the description says 26”. I checked the instructions and did nothing wrong. The posts are so close together it was hard to get the flowers on. I had extra pieces?!
It was easy to assemble and very cute, but I will be returning because this just really isn’t what I ordered in terms of dimensions.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHISU6WTZZJNNVYK5A5UITDIWCNQ
reviews.review: \n   This is such a cute little cat tree. Everyone who has stopped by the house has commented on how cute it is. When I moved recently a mama cat who was pregnant adopted me and then she had 4 kittens and we kept them all. This cat tree takes about 10 minutes to put together and it is very easy to assemble. It is soft and very well made. My kittens love it and jump all over it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHEXCV7G2NTTKKFDGC22UYIZTQMA
reviews.review: \n   I love how cute and very colorful this cat tree is. I chose this one as I thought the flower shape was adorable and I needed something for the cats to scratch and play with so they would stop scratching my furniture. They really enjoy batting the ball around and have enjoyed the scratching post. My cats are big boys but they still love this little scratching post! It’s held up well and it was a very easy assembly.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGAR2C62XPGZQLEJ35GWTYT5V5SQ
reviews.review:
\n  Quick and easy to assemble. Came with easy to follow instructions.
It is bright and colorful and our cat loves to snuggle in the top part. She\'s a fairly large cat and this is sturdy enough for her to scratch and climb all over\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGJI5VQIBG6QNNPLUU6FNTMPZIAA
reviews.review: \n  This is an absolutely adorable spot for my kitty’s to hang out!  They just love it. It’s the perfect height to sit in front of the window so that the cats can watch outside.  Delivery was quick. Great price!  It was easy to put together. And my cats love it!  5 stars all around\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH2O56EYVEYJYDRJJUBWECLGLBHA
reviews.review: \n  My fur babies LOOOVE it😻😻\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHFBKVZZ232DXWVLW6X7VDRKA34A
reviews.review: \n  Well worth the money. The colors really catch my cats attention. Material is soft for napping.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGGZR3X5EWVAMOR4VBBINOHWAGBA
reviews.review_title: Better than towers I’ve paid $100+ for
reviews.review: \n  Great product for a great price! This tower is sturdier and easier to assemble than cat towers double the price. And the cats love it!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGCVT4EYSDM4OR4NIJMCTMI6DDKA
reviews.review: \n  Really cute. It is wobbly no matter how tight you screw the poles in. And it could\'ve been a bit taller for the price. But cats love it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFO3CTUIZF4DD5XUKZCWQLD5JFIQ
reviews.review: \n  This adorable cat scratcher is great for kittens 1st scratching post, the baby soft carpet, small platform and pompom are the perfect inviting space for kitty to play- compact and fits great in front of windows to give kitty a great view\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFQEI7PQA65B7TBF2SLT2EBA4S7A
reviews.review: \n  Just as described. Worked great! Nice quality and great value and price. Theses things are just perfect.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFDJHGQGAKAJOLWNCTBBEOBCDHEQ
reviews.review: \n  baseboard broke within about 3 weeks. my cat was under 9 when we got this\n
